title: lol wont lunch
body:
hey guys 
i didnt have much space in  drive c 
so i cut lol and pased it in amother drive 
but it wont lunch 
i dont know why
sorry if i asked it in wrong palce
help me

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having a problem getting the client to launch after installing League onto an external hard drive. Issues like this can pop up when League is is installed externally, therefore it needs to be installed on your default drive in order to run properly. 

Your best bet is to clear up some space on your default drive and install League there.

wait, who are you.

are you porocles but with a name change?
No, I'm Porocles!  Broporo has joined the team, and will be posting on H&S with me!   {{summoner:31}}

so we have poro brothers in H&S now?
